channel.title: Screen Resolution
channel.description:
The game changes my res while running and changes back when I quit, I'm fine with this. But very occasionally when I quit, it doesn't get changed back.
No big deal, just go and set resolution again, but I thought you might want to know.

item.title: Screen Resolution
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Might be a good idea to set the game to your native resolution, it will look more crisp and maybe less distorted (depends on the aspect ratio) plus it won’t change res when you start/quit the game. If the game is already set to your desktop resolution maybe adding -novid in the game launch options will work.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen Resolution
item.dc:creator: All_our_Bass
item.description:
I haven’t messed with launch options at all, since I didn’t have trouble running the game as is, so… probably no.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen Resolution
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Do you have the “-dxlevel xx” command enabled in the launch options?

Read full topic
